summary: A very realistic interpretation of one of the bloodiest battles of the Vietnam War.
cast: Anthony Barrile|Michael Boatman|Don Cheadle|Michael Dolan|Don James|Dylan McDermott|Michael A. Nickles|Harry O'Reilly|Daniel O'Shea|Tim Quill|Tommy Swerdlow|Courtney B. Vance|Steven Weber|Tegan West|Kieu Chinh|Doug Goodman|J.C. Palmore|J.D. Van Sickle|Brad Cassini|Bernhard Floedl|Ken Glover|Baron Jackson|Berto Spoor|Alan Vafides|Le Thanh Van
title: La colina de la hamburguesa
